name: A Jumper (Mavericks)
description:
No specific MAC or LINUX download yet, although I'll try to do that whenever I make my next game. I hope y'all enjoy this tho.. spent a lot of time making it and it's also my second game ever!

Controls:-

Space Bar = Jump

WASD = Movement Keys

Tools Used:-

Unity (duh)

Pixlr PC E for the logo but I'm extremely bad at it

Chrome Music Lab for music :3

Anyway, Enjoy.
